urls.title: Charlotte Cross: Are we prepared for flooding in Covid times? | ITV News
urls.description: With the added challenge of a global pandemic, Environment Correspondent Charlotte Cross looks at how we're placed if we have another winter as wet as the last.

text:
It comes after I asked councils and the @EnvAgency at the end of last year how prepared we were if flooding struck again during the pandemic.

They all said yes.

Storm Christoph could be about to put that to the test.

https://t.co/aNkUCBF8gU
